docs.snippet: Would you like to know whether sage investor and mammoth hedge fund manager John Paulson is bullish on stocks? Or how about what he sees as the most promising investment opportunities today? We'd love to tell you, but we've been sworn to secrecy....

docs.snippet: HALL--Alan. We mourn the passing of our esteemed Chairman of Cell Biology, a brilliant scientist whose kindness and intellect was admired and respected by all. We extend our deepest condolences to his family. The Cell Biology Program Faculty, Memo...
docs.lead_paragraph:
HALL--Alan. We mourn the passing of our esteemed Chairman of Cell Biology, a brilliant scientist whose kindness and intellect was admired and respected by all. We extend our deepest condolences to his family.

The Cell Biology Program Faculty, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center

docs.snippet: EDELSON--Jane Levin. The members of the Art Dealers Association of America mourn the passing of Jane L. Edelson, wife of Gilbert S. Edelson, former Vice President and Counsel Emeritus of the ADAA. Our sympathy and condolences go out to her husband...
docs.lead_paragraph:
EDELSON--Jane Levin.

The members of the Art Dealers Association of America mourn the passing of Jane L. Edelson, wife of Gilbert S. Edelson, former Vice President and Counsel Emeritus of the ADAA. Our sympathy and condolences go out to her husband and three daughters, Martha, Polly and Daisy. The family will be receiving at a time and place to be announced. Dorsey Waxter, President Linda Blumberg, Executive Director

COHN--Maurice J. The Atlantic Golf Club mourns the loss of fellow member, Maurice J. "Sonny" Cohn. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife, Marilyn; daughters Karen Cohn and Marcia Cohn, and his grandchildren Sarah, Hannah and Aaron.

Dennis A. Suskind, President Harvey L. Radler, Vice President

docs.snippet: DUNHAM--Edward Wood (Jack). Wiggin and Dana LLP mourns the passing of Jack Dunham, former Chair of its Executive Committee, at the age of 61. Mr. Dunham was a nationally recognized trial lawyer for over thirty years. He served as Chair of the Amer...
docs.lead_paragraph:
DUNHAM--Edward Wood

(Jack). Wiggin and Dana LLP mourns the passing of Jack Dunham, former Chair of its Executive Committee, at the age of 61. Mr. Dunham was a nationally recognized trial lawyer for over thirty years. He served as Chair of the American Bar Association Forum on Franchising from 2007 to 2009, and he was a Fellow of the American College of Trial Lawyers. Before joining Wiggin and Dana in 1979, Mr. Dunham was a law clerk to the Honorable Robert A. Ainsworth, Jr., of the U.S. Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. He was a Phi Beta Kappa graduate of Trinity College and received his J.D. from the NYU School of Law. We extend our deepest sympathies to Betsey, Nick, Hayden, John and Eliza.
